en.item.beeswax.name: Beeswax
en.item.beeswax.description: Increase the [kw_proctype]accuracy[/c] of [kw_projectile]certain projectiles[/c] by [kw_number]10%[/c] [kw_perstack](+10% per stack)[/c].
en.item.eviction_notice.name: Eviction Notice
en.item.eviction_notice.description: Upon hitting a target, if [kw_health]health[/c] is equal to or above [kw_number]80%[/c] of [kw_health]maximum health[/c], create a paperwork projectile that deals [kw_number]400%[/c] [kw_perstack](+100% per stack)[/c] [kw_damage]base damage[/c].
en.item.serrated_stinger.name: Serrated Stinger
en.item.serrated_stinger.pickup: Attacks have a chance to inflict [kw_damage]bleeding[/c].
en.item.serrated_stinger.description: [kw_number]10%[/c] [kw_perstack](+10% per stack)[/c] chance to inflict targets with [kw_damage]bleeding[/c] on hit.
en.item.emergency_field_kit.name: Emergency Field Kit
en.item.emergency_field_kit_consumed.name: Emergency Field Kit (Consumed)
en.item.bloody_dagger.name: Old Knife
en.item.bloody_dagger.description: Do [kw_number]20%[/c] [kw_perstack](+20% per stack)[/c] [kw_damage]bonus damage[/c] to targets facing away from you.
en.item.lucky_clover.name: Lucky Clover
en.item.heal_on_level.name: Torn Platemail
en.item.heal_on_level.description: Heal [kw_number]25%[/c] [kw_perstack](+25% per stack)[/c] of new [kw_health]max health[/c] post-level up.
en.item.hyperthreader.name: Hyperthreader
en.item.hyperthreader.description: Increase movement speed by [kw_number]50%[/c] [kw_perstack](+25% per stack)[/c] and jump height by [kw_number]2[/c] units.
en.modifier.cut_hp.name: Reckless
en.modifier.cut_hp.description: [kw_health]Maximum health[/c] is multiplied by [kw_number]50%[/c] [kw_perstack](x50% per stack)[/c], [kw_damage]damage[/c] is multiplied by [kw_number]200%[/c] [kw_perstack](x200% per stack)[/c].
en.modifier.evolution.name: Evolution
